name: kitty
description: fast, featureful, cross-platform, GPU-based terminal emulator

dependencies.name: harfbuzz
dependencies.description: The Harfbuzz package contains an OpenType text shaping engine.

dependencies.name: libxkbcommon
dependencies.description:
xkbcommon is a library to handle keyboard descriptions, including
loading them from disk, parsing them and handling their state. It's
mainly meant for client toolkits, window systems, and other system
applications.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: gl
dependencies.description: Placeholder for external OpenGL libraries from hardware vendors

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
